Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Authorizes the village of Newark to impose a hotel or motel room or seasonal rental occupancy tax
Summary: Authorizes the village of Newark to impose a hotel or motel room or seasonal rental occupancy tax; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing the village of Newark to impose a hotel, motel or seasonal rental occupancy tax; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
